梍字的基本解释

梍
zào
皂荚树，落叶乔木，枝上有刺，羽状复叶，结荚果，可用来洗衣物，刺、树皮和荚果可以入药。
栎树的果实。

梍字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zào］
［《集韻》在早切，上晧，從。］
(1)木名。即皂荚树。
(2)同“皁”。栎实。

梍字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　梍； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页528第19
【集韻】【類篇】?在早切，音皁。木名。莢實。【字彙】櫟實。

梍字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
梍字的起名意思

暂无。

梍
Basic explanation of words
梍
zào
Honey locust tree, deciduous tree, with thorns, pinnate compound leaves, pod-bearing fruit, can be used for laundry, thorns, bark and pods can be used as medicine.
The fruit of the oak tree.
梍
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zào］
["Ji Yun" cut early, Shang Hao, from. ]
(1) Wooden name. That is honey locust tree.
(2) Same as "soap". Quercus.
梍
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　梍; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 528 Page 19
[Ji Yun] [Class Chapter]? Cut early, sound soap. Wooden name. Pods. [Words] Quercus.
